scripts.build: yarn run clean && yarn workspaces run build
scripts.clean: concurrently "yarn workspace client run clean" "yarn workspace @tenetxyz/registry run clean" "yarn workspace @tenetxyz/contracts run clean" "yarn workspace @tenetxyz/base-ca run clean" "yarn workspace @tenetxyz/level2-ca run clean" "yarn workspace @tenetxyz/level3-ca run clean"
scripts.deploy: concurrently -n contracts,client -c cyan,magenta "cd packages/contracts && yarn run dev" "cd packages/client && yarn run deploy"
scripts.dev: yarn run clean && yarn run dev-no-clean
scripts.dev-no-clean: concurrently -n anvil,contracts,client,ca-client -c blue,cyan,magenta,green "cd packages/scripts && yarn run anvil" "yarn run dev:contracts" "yarn run dev:client"  "yarn run dev:ca-client"
scripts.dev-no-client: concurrently -n anvil,contracts,cyan,magenta "cd packages/scripts && yarn run anvil" "yarn run dev:contracts"
scripts.deploy:ca: concurrently -n base -c blue "yarn workspace @tenetxyz/base-ca run deploy:local" && concurrently -n level2:ca -c cyan "yarn workspace @tenetxyz/level2-ca run deploy:local" && concurrently -n level3-ca -c magenta "yarn workspace @tenetxyz/level3-ca run deploy:local"
scripts.build:ca: concurrently -n base,level2,level3 -c blue,cyan,magenta "cd packages/base-ca && yarn run build:local" "cd packages/level2-ca && yarn run build:local" "cd packages/level3-ca && yarn run build:local"
scripts.dev:contracts: concurrently -n registry -c red "yarn workspace @tenetxyz/registry run deploy" && yarn run build:ca && yarn run deploy:ca && concurrently -n world -c yellow "yarn workspace @tenetxyz/contracts run deploy:local" && concurrently -n level2-extensions -c blue "yarn workspace @tenetxyz/level2-ca-extensions-1 run deploy:local"
scripts.mud:up: yarn workspaces foreach -t run yarn mud set-version -v canary && yarn install
